de:
The MAS DE CASTEL is a traditional and charming hotel, situated in the quiet of the countryside, just 3 kms south of the historical center of Sarlat, from where it is well-signposted following the direction of the Dordogne Valley or Gourdon.

It is in the heart of one of the most lovely tourist regions of France : the Périgord Noir.. Perched on a green hillside, the MAS DE CASTEL can offer you a peaceful holiday.
The hotel is situaded in a residential area just outside of Sarlat and was once an old farmhouse.
Now transformed, the hotel has become a friendly country inn with modern facilities but not losing its old charm. You will find that the nights are so quiet that you will awake just in time to have a quick swim before breakfast and find the time to enjoy life in the Périgord.
en:
The MAS DE CASTEL is a traditional and charming hotel, situated in the quiet of the countryside, just 3 kms south of the historical center of Sarlat, from where it is well-signposted following the direction of the Dordogne Valley or Gourdon.

It is in the heart of one of the most lovely tourist regions of France : the Périgord Noir.. Perched on a green hillside, the MAS DE CASTEL can offer you a peaceful holiday.
The hotel is situaded in a residential area just outside of Sarlat and was once an old farmhouse.
Now transformed, the hotel has become a friendly country inn with modern facilities but not losing its old charm. You will find that the nights are so quiet that you will awake just in time to have a quick swim before breakfast and find the time to enjoy life in the Périgord.
it:
Alla periferia di Sarlat, un hotel di charme situato a due passi da Sarlat, in campagna, in un ambiente verde lontano dalla folla e dal rumore.
Tutte le camere sono personalizzate, dotate di un comfort ***.
Wifi gratuito in tutto l'hotel.
Terrazze con mobili da giardino, piscina riscaldata, parco fiorito.
Accoglienza calorosa.
Posate i vostri bagagli e noi ci occuperemo di tutto ad un prezzo ragionevole!
fr:
En périphérie, hôtel de charme situé à deux pas de Sarlat, à la campagne, dans un écrin de verdure loin de la foule et du bruit.
Toutes les chambres sont personnalisées, équipées d'un confort ***.
Wifi gratuit dans tout l'hôtel.
Terrasses avec salon de jardin, piscine chauffée, parc fleuri.
Accueil chaleureux.
Posez vos bagages on s'occupe de tout à prix doux !

It is in the heart of one of the most lovely tourist regions of France : the Périgord Noir.. Perched on a green hillside, the MAS DE CASTEL can offer you a peaceful holiday.
The hotel is situaded in a residential area just outside of Sarlat and was once an old farmhouse.
Now transformed, the hotel has become a friendly country inn with modern facilities but not losing its old charm. You will find that the nights are so quiet that you will awake just in time to have a quick swim before breakfast and find the time to enjoy life in the Périgord.

de: Ich habe kein Restaurant, biete aber ausnahmsweise Zimmerservice an, Essenstablett vorhanden
en: I do not have a restaurant but will exceptionally offer room service, meal tray available
it: Non ho un ristorante, ma eccezionalmente offro il servizio in camera, vassoio per i pasti disponibile
fr: Je ne dispose pas d'un restaurant mais proposerai exceptionnellement le room-service, Plateau repas à disposition
es: No tengo restaurante, pero excepcionalmente ofrezco servicio de habitaciones, bandeja de comida disponible
nl: Ik heb geen restaurant, maar zal bij uitzondering roomservice aanbieden, maaltijdlade beschikbaar

hasBeenCreatedBy.schema:legalName: Office de Tourisme Sarlat Périgord Noir

de: Collecter, mettre en commun et diffuser le plus largement possible une information complète et de qualité au service de nos habitants et de nos visiteurs : voici les objectifs du SIRTAQUI, Système d’Information Régional Touristique de Nouvelle-AQUItaine. Le dispositif est mis en œuvre conjointement par le Comité Régional de Tourisme de Nouvelle-Aquitaine, les services touristiques de la Corrèze, de la Creuse, de la Dordogne, de la Gironde, des Landes, du Lot-et-Garonne, des Pyrénées-Atlantiques, des Deux-Sèvres, de la Vienne et de la Haute-Vienne, en collaboration avec les Offices de Tourisme, et avec le soutien financier de l’Europe et du Conseil Régional.
en: Collecter, mettre en commun et diffuser le plus largement possible une information complète et de qualité au service de nos habitants et de nos visiteurs : voici les objectifs du SIRTAQUI, Système d’Information Régional Touristique de Nouvelle-AQUItaine. Le dispositif est mis en œuvre conjointement par le Comité Régional de Tourisme de Nouvelle-Aquitaine, les services touristiques de la Corrèze, de la Creuse, de la Dordogne, de la Gironde, des Landes, du Lot-et-Garonne, des Pyrénées-Atlantiques, des Deux-Sèvres, de la Vienne et de la Haute-Vienne, en collaboration avec les Offices de Tourisme, et avec le soutien financier de l’Europe et du Conseil Régional.

de:
The MAS DE CASTEL is a traditional and charming hotel, situated in the quiet of the countryside, just 3 kms south of the historical center of Sarlat, from where it is well-signposted following the direction of the Dordogne Valley or Gourdon.

It is in the heart of one of the most lovely tourist regions of France : the Périgord Noir.. Perched on a green hillside, the MAS DE CASTEL can offer you a peaceful holiday.
The hotel is situaded in a residential area just outside of Sarlat and was once an old farmhouse.
Now transformed, the hotel has become a friendly country inn with modern facilities but not losing its old charm. You will find that the nights are so quiet that you will awake just in time to have a quick swim before breakfast and find the time to enjoy life in the Périgord.
